title: Playtest Feedback Form
comment: This survey is my official submission!
intro:
Thank you for playtesting Stories from Danger's Den!

This survey will ask about your playtesting experience. All questions are optional; your answers will help guide further development.

questions.text: How did you find out about Stories from Danger's Den?
How would you rate the difficulty of your play session?
What were some things you most enjoyed about playing?
What do you see as the game's most urgent needs for improvement?
Which types of settings did you see as you played?
Which of these do you most want to see in the next version of the game?
If you have any other comments or suggestions, please share them here.

May we contact you with more questions about your experience?

If so, please provide your email address.
